## 🎠 Carousel Templates

Design rich, scrollable, and interactive message layouts using **Carousel Templates** — now supported via **Meta’s Cloud API.**

<NoteInfo
  description={
    <p className="text-sm text-fd-foreground !my-0 px-2 py-2">
      🔔 Carousel Templates are available only for WhatsApp Cloud API users and
      are also supported on <strong>WhatsApp Web</strong> for a seamless
      multi-device experience.
    </p>
  }
/>

## 🧩 What Are Carousel Templates?

Carousel Templates let you send a text message followed by a horizontal scroll of up to **10 visually-rich cards**. Each card can include media, text, and interactive buttons, making it perfect for showcasing products, services, or features.

### 🛠️ How to Create a Carousel Template

1. **Navigate to Templates**

- Go to **Template module** and click + **Create New Template.** and select start from scratch
  <VideoLayout url={"/assets/video/template/carousel_1.mp4"} />

2. **Select Template Category**

- Choose **“Carousel Template”** as the template type.
- Choose the WhatsApp channel you'd like to use and select the desired language.
- Add the content in message body as per your requirement.

<VideoLayout url={"/assets/video/template/carousel_2.mp4"} />

3. **Choose Carousel Format**

#### Select Media Header Type

- **Image Carousel:** Upload images (.JPEG, .JPG, .PNG) – max size 5 MB per card.
- **Video Carousel:** Upload short videos (.mp4, .3gpp) – max size 10 MB per card.

#### Set Button Types

- Button options include:
  - **Quick Reply** (default for Button 1)
  - **URL** (link to your website, product page, etc.)
  - **Phone Number** (for instant call-to-action)
    <VideoLayout url={"/assets/video/template/carousel_3.mp4"} />

4. **Add Carousel Cards**

- Click **+ Add Carousel Card** for each card you want to include.
- Each card must contain:
  - A media file (image/video depending on format)
  - **Card Body Text** (descriptive or promotional text)
  - **At least one button** (up to 2 supported per card)
    <VideoLayout url={"/assets/video/template/carousel_4.mp4"} />

5. **Preview & Submit**

- Review your carousel cards and their interactive elements.
- Click **Submit** to send the template to **Meta** for approval.
  <VideoLayout url={"/assets/video/template/carousel_5.mp4"} />

### 📌 Things to Remember

- A maximum of **10 cards** can be added per carousel template.
- Each card must include a media header and at least one button.
- Carousel templates are **only available via the Cloud API.**
- Approval from **Meta** is typically completed within **24 hours.**
